name: Library
description: Create a reusable static library project for mikroSDK 2.0 in C language. Ready for integration across multiple applications.
files_included:
**CMakeLists.txt:** Build configuration for your static library.
**lib.c:** Source file with reusable library logic.
**lib.h:** Header file declaring library functions.
outputs: **.a:** Static library file with precompiled code.
